item.title: Beyond Fest Lineup Includes ‘Good Fortune,’ ‘Dust Bunny,’ ‘The Furious’
item.description: Park Chan-wook’s ‘No Other Choice’ will open the genre fest in Los Angeles and Yorgos Lanthimos’ ‘Bugonia’ will close the Sept. 23 to Oct. 8 event.

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Sentimental Value’ Join ‘Sinners’ Atop List of Oscar Frontrunners
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter’s executive editor of awards coverage offers his biggest takeaways from another Labor Day weekend in the Rockies.

item.title: France’s Oscar Submission Dilemma: Why ‘Nouvelle Vague’ and ‘It Was Just an Accident’ Would Both Be Unprecedented Choices
